title: Five people shot in Hot Springs, no shooter identified
content:
HOT SPRINGS, Ark. (KTHV) - Five people were shot Thursday night around 6:53 p.m. in Hot Springs near the 300 block of Lacey Street.
Hot Springs police at this time have no suspects in custody. One of the victims was airlifted to a hospital while the other four were treated at the local St. Vincent hospital. Crowd control was called to the hospital after the four victims had arrived.
Detectives are still on the scene interviewing witnesses to determine a cause. We will have more information as it becomes available.
Stay tuned to THV11 and THV11.com for more information.
